PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_PRODUCT_GROUP
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PRODUCT_GROUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.910577000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,summary_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,lob_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_product_group;

body.name: DA_BILLING_PRODUCT_GROUP
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PRODUCT_GROUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.931655000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,summary_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,lob_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product_group.add, parms=' || detail_product_group_nm || '|' || summary_product_group_nm || '|' || lob_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_product_group a
(
a.detail_product_group_nm
,a.summary_product_group_nm
,a.lob_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.detail_product_group_nm
,add.summary_product_group_nm
,add.lob_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product_group.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product_group.del, parms=' || detail_product_group_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_product_group a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.detail_product_group_nm = del.detail_product_group_nm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product_group.del');

END del;

END da_billing_product_group;
